meanings.definition: The quality or state of being salty.
meanings.sent1: I could taste the saltiness of the sea in the air.
meanings.sent2: The soup's saltiness was just right for my liking.
meanings.sent3: The saltiness of the chips made me pucker my lips in surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her words had a certain saltiness to them, leaving a bitter aftertaste.
meanings.sent5: The saltiness of the tears on his cheeks was a stark reminder of his pain.

meanings.definition: A taste sensation characterized by the presence of salt.
meanings.sent1: The saltiness of the popcorn made it irresistible.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the saltiness of pretzels as a snack.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected saltiness of the cake caught me off guard.
meanings.sent4: The saltiness of the ocean breeze tingled on my tongue.
meanings.sent5: The saltiness of the dish enhanced its flavors, making it a culinary delight.

meanings.definition: A feeling of bitterness or resentment.
meanings.sent1: The saltiness in her tone hinted at underlying frustration.
meanings.sent2: His words were filled with saltiness after the argument.
meanings.sent3: She couldn't hide the saltiness in her expression during the meeting.
meanings.sent4: The saltiness in his attitude made it hard to approach him.
meanings.sent5: The saltiness of the situation lingered in the room long after they had left.
